docs.title: Current Target
docs.text: AWS Solutions Architect associate

docs.title: Skill Builder page
docs.text:
https://skillbuilder.aws/exam-prep/solutions-architect-associate

Overall 200+ services available on amazon . 26+ Regions Dedicated network circuit

docs.title: IaaS
docs.text:
• S3 buckets , EC2 instances
  • For VM - customer responsible for OS , patches etc`

docs.title: PaaS
docs.text:
• RDS - relational data services
  • Configuration settings
  • Serverless

docs.title: SaaS
docs.text:
• Customer deploys High-level software
  • Limited configuration and settings

docs.title: Well architected framework
docs.text: Six-pillars-based design

docs.title: Operational excellence
docs.text:
• Monitoring IT services deployed AWS services.
  • Performance metrics via CloudWatch

docs.title: Security
docs.text:
• Data confidentiality. Data at rest \ transit
  • Data integrity (cloud trail auditing)
  • IAM Identity and access management , policies , threat detection

docs.title: Reliability
docs.text:
• Distributed systems across regions ( S3 replication )
  • DRP - disaster recovery plan
  • Change when needed - auto-scaling

docs.title: Performance efficiency
docs.text:
• Match service sizing to a business needs
  • Monitor performance metrics and adjust
  • See dashboard visualization

docs.title: Cost optimization
docs.text:
• Remove unused resources
  • Use spot and reserved instances where possible
  • Cost budget alerts

docs.title: Matching AWS with business needs
docs.text:
• Business needs assessment
  • Familiarity of AWS srev ices
  • Network \ Compute requirements

docs.title: Network requirements
docs.text:
• VPCs , subnets
  • VPC peering
  • VPN
  • Direct connect
  • HTTPS
  • GuardDuty \ CloudWatch network

docs.title: Compute requirements
docs.text:
• EC2 instances
  • Managed services

docs.title: Storage requirements
docs.text:
• S3 bucket object storage
  • Databases - SQL \ NoSQL
  • Amazon macie data classification , server side encryption

docs.title: Monitoring and Security
docs.text:
• CloudWatch monitoring
  • CloudTrail auditing
  • Amazon Detective
  • Network ACLs
  • Security groups
  • WAF - web application firewall
  • Security standards compliance

docs.title: Installing AWS CLI on Windows
docs.text:
msiexec.exe /i https://awscli.amazonaws.com/AWSCLIV2.msi

Using cli wizard

aws configure

docs.title: Installing AWS CLI on Linux
docs.text:
• Amazon linux image already have CLI installed
curl "https://awscli.amazonaws.com/awscli-exe-linux-x86_64.zip" -o "awscliv2.zip"
unzip awscliv2.zip
sudo ./aws/install

docs.title: AWS PowerShell
docs.text:
pwsh

Switch from bash to powershell

docs.title: AWS CloudShell
docs.text:
• Cloud-based shell.
  • Multiple shells

docs.title: AWS Outpost
docs.text:
• Run AWS services on-prem or edge locations
  • Equipments racks in form of U , 1U , 2U up to 42U
  • U - 1.75 inches of vertical height

docs.title: Outpost Use-cases
docs.text:
• Local data processing
  • Data residency restrictions
  • Low latency access

docs.title: AWS Transfer
docs.text: • Transfer files from local to S3 bucket

docs.title: Product overview :
docs.text: A system , that will display historical data about my EV driving and battery state.

docs.title: Components
docs.text: System will have the following components :

docs.title: Android app
docs.text: Will have two main goals: 1) To read vehicle EV state and send it to backend when android auto is connected 2) To display the data on Android APP and\or AndroidAuto infotainment screen
